Title: Piercing Talons and Slavering Jaws
Description:
First the hawks came. You've probably seen some of them circling up above.

The wolves came shortly after. I think they smelled my weakness.

I'm not nearly as brave as Master Shang thought I was. The master will be quite cross with me if I don't do something about these beasts.

Can... can you help, $gsir:ma'am;?
ObjectivesText: Kill 5 Thieving Plainshawks and 6 Thieving Wolves.
CompletionText: I wish I were brave enough to fight them, but...
RewardText: They... they're not stopping, but at least we fought back. Right?
